head.description: An old-spelling transcription of The Merchant of Venice, Folio version, 1623.
head.isFormatOf: Hinman, Charlton, ed. Norton Facsimile of the First Folio. New York: W.W. Norton, 1968.
head.editorialPrinciple: The transcripts presented here follow the Folio as exactly as an electronic version permits; spelling follows the original, with no attempt to correct errors; word spacing is normalized; and modern forms are substituted for letters and ligatures that have no modern equivalent in current browsers (for example, the long 's').
